column4: Ok. This is my first time on the Ubuntu Channel. I have a specific question about a certain wireless card's compatability. Can someone help me?
(Ill just namedrop with the info) PCMCIA
Any chance for a little feedback?
: Lost track .. but I don't know much about PCMCIA .. save that some cards actually do work.  (Unlike USB, I guess .. where its really seldom).
Yeah. Thats pretty much the answer i keep getting. Any recommendations on a 100% reliable card that will work with Ubuntu?
: I asked about that before .. but didn't get an answer.
: I know a girl who has a card that works though.
: I doubt she's home / awake though.
: She is looking for it now.
: "Orinoco" is the name of the card .. "PC-card"
Ok, ill write that down. Thanks kindly. Very Muchly Appreciated ^^
